Standard_Text: Recollect, talk, and write about materials read.

Standard_Text: Read poems, rhymes, songs, and stories.

Standard_Text: Read a good representation of grade-level-appropriate text, making progress toward the goal of reading 500,000 words annually by grade four (e.g., classic and contemporary literature, magazines, newspapers, online information).
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Read widely and use various media for information, personal interest, and lifelong learning:
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Students integrate information literacy skills into all areas of learning.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Communicate understanding by using at least one fact or photograph, or both, found in a current and credible source.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Understand that the Internet connects the user to the rest of the world.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Describe the roles of authors and illustrators and their contribution to print and digital materials.

Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Students use information.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Determine the relevance of the information:
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Students evaluate information.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Identify the need to request assistance from a trusted adult if the information source makes the student uncomfortable.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Retrieve information in a timely, safe, and responsible manner:
Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Demonstrate correct procedures to turn the computer on and off and open and close applications.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Identify the services and resources of the public library.

Standard_Text: Identify the front cover, back cover, and title page of a book, in print and in digital formats, and compare and contrast them.

Standard_Text: Identify basic digital devices and parts of a computer (e.g., DVD player, remote control, digital camera, monitor, power button, keyboard, mouse).
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Alphabetize to the first letter to locate books in the library.

Standard_Text: Understand how to locate, check out, and care for a variety of library resources, both print and digital.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Identify and locate a variety of resources online and in other formats by using effective search strategies:
Subject: Library (2010-)

Standard_Text: Ask who, what, when, where, and how questions.
Subject: Library (2010-)

Subject: Library (2010-)
